languages.text: {n}Лицо Риззы каменеет. Она напряженно буравит взглядом дно стакана, словно пытаясь там найти какой-то ответ. Наконец, она поднимает необычайно усталый взгляд на вас.{/n} "А вы жестоки, Ваша Светлость. Нашли где у старой пиратки зарыта совесть и выволокли ее на белый свет, кричащую и брыкающуюся".

{n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Риззы каменеет. Она напряженно буравит взглядом дно стакана, словно пытаясь там найти какой-то ответ. Наконец, она поднимает необычайно усталый взгляд на вас.{/n} "А вы жестоки, Ваша Светлость. Нашли где у старой пиратки зарыта совесть и выволокли ее на белый свет, кричащую и брыкающуюся".

languages.text: {n}莱萨愣在了那里。她紧张地盯着酒杯，似乎想在杯底找到答案。到最后，她抬起头，看着你，露出了无比疲惫的神情。{/n}“你可真残忍，大人，你知道吗？你找到了这个老海盗残存的良知，对它又踢又打，把它硬生生地拽到了光明之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."

traits.locale_text: {n}莱萨愣在了那里。她紧张地盯着酒杯，似乎想在杯底找到答案。到最后，她抬起头，看着你，露出了无比疲惫的申请。{/n}“你可真残忍，大人，你知道吗？你找到了这个老海盗剩下的良知，还又踢又打，把它硬生生地拽到了光明之中。”
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}リザの表情が石のように固まった。グラスの底に答えが隠れているかのように、グラスの中を凝視する。しばらくして顔を上げ、疲れた目であなたを見た。{/n}「陛下は冷酷ですね。この年老いた海賊の良心がどこに隠れているのかを見つけ出し、蹴ったり怒鳴ったりして白日の下にさらすとは」
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."

traits.locale_text: {n}リザの表情が石のように固まった。グラスの底に答えが隠れているかのように、グラスの中を凝視する。しばらくして顔を上げ、疲れた目であなたを見た。{/n}「陛下は冷酷ですね。この年老いた海賊の良心がどこに隠れているのかを見つけ出し、蹴ったり怒鳴ったりして白日の下にさらすとは」
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzza se queda de piedra. Mira con tensión su vaso, como si buscara una respuesta en el fondo. Finalmente, te mira, con aspecto cansado.{/n} «Es usted cruel, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La forma en la que encontró donde esta vieja pirata escondía su conciencia y la arrastró pataleando y gritando hacia la luz».
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzza se queda de piedra. Mira con tensión su vaso, como si buscara una respuesta en el fondo. Finalmente, te mira, con aspecto cansado.{/n} «Es usted cruel, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La forma en la que encontró donde esta vieja pirata escondía su conciencia y la arrastró pataleando y gritando hacia la luz».
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Ryzzas Miene versteinert sich. Sie starrt in ihr Glas, als würde sie versuchen, darin irgendeine Antwort zu finden. Schließlich hebt sie den Blick und sieht dich an. Sie sieht unglaublich müde aus.{/n} "Ihr seid grausam, wisst Ihr, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Wie Ihr herausgefunden habt, wo diese alte Piratin ihr Gewissen versteckt, und es dann zeternd und schreiend ans Licht gezerrt habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ryzzas Miene versteinert sich. Sie starrt in ihr Glas, als würde sie versuchen, darin irgendeine Antwort zu finden. Schließlich hebt sie den Blick und sieht dich an. Sie sieht unglaublich müde aus.{/n} "Ihr seid grausam, wisst Ihr, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Wie Ihr herausgefunden habt, wo diese alte Piratin ihr Gewissen versteckt, und es dann zeternd und schreiend ans Licht gezerrt habt."
traits.speaker: FootfallPirateVendor_Rizza_Ch_4

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Ryzza se fait de marbre. Elle plonge le regard dans son verre, comme si elle cherchait une réponse au fond. Enfin, elle relève les yeux vers vous, l'air exténué.{/n} « Vous êtes bien {mf|cruel|cruelle}, Votre Seigneurie, pour débusquer ainsi la conscience de cette vieille pirate et la traîner de force dans la lumière. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."

languages.text: {n}Ryzza bir anda ciddileşiyor. Cevabı dibinde arar gibi gergince bardağına bakıyor. Nihayet başını kaldırıp sana dönüyor. Belli ki oldukça yorgun.{/n} "Çok zalimsin be {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Bu yaşlı korsanın vicdanını saklandığı delikten yaka paça çıkarıp ışığın altına attın ya, çok zalimsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Ryzza's expression turns to stone. She peers tensely into her glass as if trying to find some answer at the bottom of it. Finally, she raises her eyes to you, looking incredibly tired.{/n} "You're cruel, you know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. The way you found where this old pirate was hiding her conscience and dragged it kicking and screaming into the light."
